entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 1:04 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: S 45 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
